name: timeline
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a line that shows the time and the order in which events have happened
a plan that shows how long something will take or when things will happen
trans_examp.trans_cn: （显示做某事所需时间或某事何时发生的）时间表

trans_examp.trans_en: the part of a social media website where items that have been added by you, or that relate to you, are shown

example.eg: You can use these tools to control what you share on your profile and timeline.
example.egtrans: 你可以使用这些工具来控制你在个人资料里和时间轴上所分享的内容。
